name: vicinae-snippets
title: Vicinae Snippets
description: Create, manage, and quickly paste text snippets in Vicinae (similar to Raycast Snippets). Supports dynamic placeholders and import/export.
author: xiadengma

commands.name: create-snippet
commands.title: Create Snippet
commands.subtitle: Create a new snippet
commands.description: Create and save a snippet (supports dynamic placeholders)

commands.name: import-snippets
commands.title: Import Snippets
commands.subtitle: Import snippets from JSON
commands.description: Import from a file first (with clipboard fallback) and show an import report

commands.name: export-snippets
commands.title: Export Snippets
commands.subtitle: Export snippets to JSON
commands.description: Export snippets to a JSON file and also copy to the clipboard

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build
